outputs.output_descr: Sustainable Land Management Support and Adaptive Management (CPP NAM SLM SAM) Project. Capacity at systemic, institutional and individual level built and sustained, ensuring cross-sectoral and demand driven coordination and implementation of SLM activities; and Cost effective, innovative and appropriate SLM techniques which integrate environmental and economic benefits are identified and disseminated.
